languages.text: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer, the wearer gains the {g|f:22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9}Kick{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} to use until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer's area attack damages at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer, the wearer gains the Kick ability that costs 0 AP to use until the end of their turn.

Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} damages at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer, the wearer gains the Kick {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} to use until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer, the wearer gains the Kick {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} to use until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer, the wearer gains the {g|f:22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9}Kick{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} to use until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer, the wearer gains the {g|f:22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9}Kick{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} to use until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}对2格内至少两名敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，装备者获得疾速猛踢{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，此能力不消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，可在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束前使用。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer, the wearer gains the Kick {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} to use until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}对2格内至少两名敌人造成伤害时，装备者获得疾速猛踢{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，此能力不消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，可在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束前使用。

languages.text: Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g}, нанося {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} хотя бы двум противникам в радиусе 2 клеток от себя, он получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} {g|f:22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9}Удар ногой{/g}, не требующую затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, которую можно применить до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} damages at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer, the wearer gains the Kick {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} to use until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g}, нанося урон хотя бы двум игрокам в радиусе 2 клеток от себя, он получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Удар ногой, не требующую затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, которую можно применить до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g}, нанося урон хотя бы двум игрокам в радиусе 2 клеток от себя, он получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Удар ногой, не требующую затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, которую можно применить до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者から半径2セル以内の少なくとも２体の敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えると、使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}消費0でキック{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使える。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer, the wearer gains the Kick {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} to use until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 半径2セル以内の2体以上の敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}のダメージを与えると、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}の消費0でキック{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用できる。

languages.text: Cada vez que los {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} del portador {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dañen{/g} a al menos dos enemigos en un radio de 2 casillas a su alrededor, obtiene la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} {g|f:22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9}Patada{/g} con coste de 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} hasta el final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer, the wearer gains the {g|f:22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9}Kick{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} to use until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que los {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} del portador dañen a al menos dos enemigos en un radio de 2 casillas a su alrededor, obtiene la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Patada con coste de 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} hasta el final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} des Trägers mindestens zwei Feinden innerhalb eines Radius von 2 Feldern um den Träger {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt, erhält der Träger bis zum Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} die Tritt-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} für 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer, the wearer gains the {g|f:22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9}Kick{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} to use until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} des Trägers mindestens zwei Feinden innerhalb eines 2-Zellen-Radius des Trägers Schaden zufügt, erhält der Träger die Tritt-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} zu Kosten von 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} bis zum Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} qui inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à au moins deux ennemis dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de lui, il bénéficie de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} {g|f:22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9}Coup de pied{/g} pour 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer, the wearer gains the {g|f:22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9}Kick{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} to use until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} qui inflige des dégâts à au moins deux ennemis dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de lui, il bénéficie de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Coup de Pied pour 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
